title: Old school player returning to league, looking to relearn the game.
body: Hello, I go by Willowman69 on OCE League of Legends server. I left the game about 5 years ago and am returning, just looking for people to help me relearn the game. Looking for anyone, for duo or ranked team for a laugh feel free to add me.

replies.body: Best suggestion, don't come back, just run away and find a different game.
